Package com.hazelcast.function

Interface ToLongFunctionEx<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the input to the function
All Superinterfaces:
Serializable, ToLongFunction<T>
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface
public interface ToLongFunctionEx<T>
extends ToLongFunction<T>, Serializable
Serializable variant of java.util.function.ToLongFunction which declares checked exception.
Since:
4.0
